Title: Alex's POV
Plot:
Alex chats with a guy on the internet and arranges to meet him. 
Sasha lends him keys to the flat for few hours while Rob's working and she's out. 

Jamie and Sooz have the same idea to use the flat while no one is around not knowing Alex will be there, they steal Rob's keys. 
As soon as Jamie and Sooz undress, Alex and Mark come in and Jamie and Sooz hide under the bed listening in disgust to what goes on above them. 

Nicki barges in looking for Sasha and finds Mark in bed.
